name: Iced Latte
description: Chilled milk over ice, capped with freshly shaken espresso.

name: Iced Cappuccino
description: A bold and balanced coffee, made with freshly shaken espresso and topped with whipped milk foam.

name: Iced Americano Black
description: Classic black coffee gently sweetened and served over ice.

name: Iced Mocha
description: An indulgent iced coffee made with a delicious chocolate sauce freshly shaken with espresso and poured over iced cold milk for a caffeinated chocolate treat.

name: Strawberry Lemonade
description: An amazing summer drink with the taste of fresh ripe strawberries and tangy zesty lemon.

name: Caramel Frappe
description: Caramel flavor with a hint of coffee & is topped with whipped topping & caramel drizzle.

name: Mocha Frappe
description: Blended with ice and topped with whipped light cream and chocolatey drizzle.

name: Tropical Mango Smoothie
description: Smoothie with banana, mango, pineapple, orange juice , coconut and milk.

name: Berry Burst
description: Smoothie with banana, black berries, raspberries, blueberries or mixed berries and oat milk.
